title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, generate, embed with any model served by Ollama.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same generate/chat/embed surface as Python.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package; use Ollama models as LangChain LLMs or chat models.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, OpenAI-compatible endpoint).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; fluent API, streaming, embeddings, list/pull/delete models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for chatting with Ollama models, history, syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copplet code-completion service for VS Code.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal retrieval-augmented-generation example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers users via any Ollama model; slash commands, thread support.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix package derivation for Ollama; pinned binaries, CUDA & ROCm variants.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama sidecar containers in CI pipelines for LLM-powered tests.

title: ollama-workflows
summary: GitHub Actions workflows to benchmark Ollama models (latency, throughput) and publish reports.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET client for Ollama; supports .NET 6+, streaming, async enumerable.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem wrapping Ollama REST API; interactive console, Rails integration examples.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-slackbot
summary: Lightweight Slack bot server (Go) that answers channel mentions via Ollama, supports threads.

title: ollama-qtgui
summary: Cross-platform Qt6 desktop GUI for Ollama; model manager, chat window, dark theme.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing typed async client for Ollama; tokio, serde, streaming support.
